description: "Take Your Body Where Your Mind Wants to Go" and when it gets a little chilly, throw on the Mental Health Heavyweight Hoody to give you the comfort you need to keep chugging along. Life can get hectic sometimes, and stepping away from the chaos of every day is sometimes exactly what we need to soothe our souls. Throw this hoody on, pack your bags or your daypack, and take a trip out the door to reset, rejuvenate, and explore the beauty and solitude of the world around you. From a sunny mid-day walk to the park to an impromptu solo sunset mission, it's the little things that can make a big impact on your happiness.
name: Marmot Mental Health Heavyweight Hoody - Unisex
